questions.question: Air conditioning …………………………. for a comfortable house.
questions.description: We use the simple present to talk about facts.

questions.question: The new hospital ……………………………… in the coming year.
questions.description: To express simple futurity, we use the simple future. The passive form is used here because the subject is not the doer of the action.

questions.description: To express simple futurity, we use the simple future.

questions.question: When I went to his place yesterday, his wife ………………………….. me a cold reception.
